DESCRIPTION.P: This block is a sum. The output is the element-wise sum of the inputs.
Input ports are located at up, left or right and down position. You must specify 3 gain numbers but if only two links are connected only the first values are used, ports are numbered anti-clock wise.

ITEM.label: Input signs
ITEM.SP: : a (1x3) vector of +1 and -1. If -1, the corresponding input is multiplied by -1 before addition.
